column1: Uchi////Moving on to some of the negatives
column2: I found that the hokkaido scallop nigiri ($9) was adorned with a significant excess of wasabi
column3: which really obscured the delicate flavor of the fresh scallop. My least favorite dish was the seaweed salad ($7)
column4: which was more complex than the typical neon-green strands you'd get at typical Japanese places
column5: but I found the seaweed's texture to be a little too mushy and somewhat unpleasant. Service of sushi rolls can be a bit slow during happy hour
column6: but they're usually worth the wait.
